doc.general: SERVER SIDE AMMUN-NATION BY SA-MP BETA TESTER JAY_ SOME UTILITY FUNCTIONS FOR HOUSEKEEPING

members.member: Server Side Ammu-Nation by SA-MP BETA Tester Jay_ Utils for loading store data and actors, and checking when a player enters/exits a store
Server-side ammunation script by SA-MP BETA Tester Jay_

SERVER SIDE AMMUNATION BY SA-MP BETA TESTER Jay_ The purpose of this script is to allow servers to improve their anticheat by controlling ammunation from their server side scripts and disabling all client side ammunation functionality. December 2014

member.name: M:ApplyActorAnimation

member.name: M:CreateMenu
member.syntax: CreateMenu(title[], columns, x, y, col1width, col2width)

members.member: Return the weapon object model id based on the weapon id
